column1: 254417,Registered Nurse (Disability and Rehabilitation),,"Administer therapy treatments to patients
column3: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column5: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column9: Teach basic living or other adaptive skills to patients or caregivers
column11: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column15: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column17: Care for patients recovering from injury and illness
column19: Care for patients with disabilities to live more independently
column21: Care for patients with mental illnesses
column23: Train patients, family members or caregivers in techniques for managing disabilities or illnesses
column25: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column27: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column29: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column33: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column35: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column41: Administer health care or medical treatments
column45: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column47: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column49: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column51: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column55: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
